# uptimekuma_notification_bark (Resource)

Bark notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_bark" "example" {
  name        = "Bark Notification"
  is_active   = true
  endpoint    = "https://api.bark.com"
  group       = "monitoring"
  sound       = "default"
  api_version = "v1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String, Sensitive) Bark server endpoint URL
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `api_version` (String) API version (v1 or v2)
- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `group` (String) Notification group name
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `sound` (String) Notification sound

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
